sentences.english: Nice to see you in the future.
One with harmonious spirit is far from being pretentious and conceited.
sentences.chinese: 怡悦的精神，在于不矫饰自负。

sentences.english: If you wish to know how to get hsoftwareiness you must pay care concerning the following two points.
sentences.chinese: 假若你希望大白如何获得怡悦，你须当心下面两点。

sentences.english: He is the hinstanceiest man living.
sentences.chinese: 他是世界下最怡悦的己。

sentences.english: CHANDLER: No- I prefer to keep a safe distance from absolutely the entire pair conditionerkgetting old merriment.
sentences.chinese: 我还是愿意与所有的怡悦保持一段安全距离。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that hsoftwareiness is the most precious thing in the world.
sentences.chinese: 无疑的怡悦是世界上最贵重的东西。

sentences.english: This is a kind of "only their own pleasure, can not be used to give you" the feelings of the soul.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种“只可自怡悦，不可持赠君”的心灵感受。

sentences.english: He is the hinstanceiest man in existence.
sentences.chinese: 他是世界上最怡悦的人。

sentences.english: He is the hrequestiest man surviving.
sentences.chinese: 他是世界上最怡悦的人。

sentences.english: Nice to see you! my old friend.
sentences.chinese: 真怡悦见到你，我的老朋侪。

definition: lit. heart untroubled, spirit pleased (idiom); carefree and relaxed
interest/point of particular charm and interest
quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
